pageTitle: Which month are you claiming support worker costs for?
h1: Which month are you claiming support worker costs for?

validation.future: Date of support must be in the past
validation.invalid: Date of support must be a real date
validation.requiredAll: Enter the month and year you had support
validation.requiredMonth: Date of support must include a month
validation.requiredYear: Date of support must include a year
validation.nonNumericMonth: Enter the month using numbers only
validation.nonNumericYear: Enter the year using numbers only
